tasks.label: Run E2E Tests with xvfb
tasks.command: cd client && xvfb-run --auto-servernum --server-args="-screen 0 1280x960x24" npm run test:e2e

tasks.label: Watch and Run E2E Tests
tasks.command: cd client && npx chokidar "src/**/*.{ts,js,svelte}" "e2e/**/*.ts" -c "npm run test:e2e:debug"

tasks.label: Watch and Run E2E Tests with xvfb

tasks.label: Run E2E Auth Tests (Firebase)
